thread.title: Infographic: The Impression That Different Fonts Give And How To Use Them Best
thread.title_full: Infographic: The Impression That Different Fonts Give And How To Use Them Best

title: Infographic: The Impression That Different Fonts Give And How To Use Them Best
text: Infographic: The Impression That Different Fonts Give And How To Use Them Best By Yoon Sann Wong , 09 Feb 2017 Subscribe to newsletter Like us on Facebook Graphic Design Crash Course has created an infographic about font psychology for beginners. It does a basic coverage of ‘serif’, ‘sans serif’, ‘script’ and ‘slab serif’. For those who need a break down of the impression that these fonts provide and suggestions on how to use them best, have a look at the visual below.
